name: FRONDE
description:
Set in 2015, FRONDE is a RPG about the story of Xavier, a teenager who moved from Akardis to Sunnyshore last year (2014) - who must help MarkalCorp to save the world for any future disasters involving the country of Frondland, a island that got shaped after a disaster at New Zealand at the early 20th century.

NEW: Update 0.1.1 is now released! Ending location reachable now! Though, the ending isn't playable.

Features:

  1. Explore the country of Frondland!
  2. Meet Xavier's old friends!
  3. Buy stuff interacting with shelves.
  4. A lot of diverse characters to meet.
  5. Supermarkets!
  6. Special shops (coming in a future update)
  7. 9 cities to visit! (Sunnyshore, Sterra, St. Pierre, Brickburg, Lowbrick, Beechville, Moondale, Akardis, Youngsnow)
  8. Placeholder slimes! (might be changed over time)
